ing.item: Egg yolk for painting the dough

directions.step:
Mix flour, butter & sugar with electric beater until dough resembles grated cheese. Finish mixing dough with hands until dough forms a compact ball. Refrigerate 30 minutes. Roll dough out until it is 1/4-inch thick. With sharp knife square the dough edges & cut the dough into 1-inch squares. With pastry brush paint the dough with beated egg yolk. Place almonds on each cookie & dush with confectiner's sugar. Place cookies on ungreased cookie sheet & bake for 15 minutes at 350. Remove cookies while still hot. Makes about 36 cookies.
MRS TERRANCE (ELBA M.) GALLAGHER
